text: From the tribe of Asher: Mashal with its pasture lands, Abdon with its pasture lands,
Let us grant them freedom to live according to their own laws as formerly; it was on account of their laws, which we abolished, that they became enraged and did all these things.‚Äù
The sun and moon and stars are bright, obedient in the task for which they are sent.
These things he said while teaching in the synagogue in Capernaum. The Words of Eternal Life.
